itemDisplayName: Add client VMs to existing deployment v1.0
description: This template provisions x number of client VMs to an existing deployment and joins them to the deployment's domain. Time to deploy: ~10 minutes. See https://aka.ms/DTL-add-clients for details.
summary: This template provisions x number of client VMs to an existing deployment and joins them to the deployment's domain. See https://aka.ms/DTL-add-clients for details and deployment guidance.
